reasons_to_visit.details: Warm days and cool evenings provide ideal conditions for all outdoor activities without summer heat.
Early fall foliage around the Vltava River and castle gardens creates beautiful photography opportunities.
Local wine harvest festivals and seasonal food experiences showcase regional traditions.
Post-peak season means easier access to attractions while still maintaining full services.
River rafting and canoeing continue with pleasant weather and beautiful autumn scenery.

reasons_to_avoid.details: September can have unpredictable weather with occasional rain as autumn transitions begin.
Early September may still have some family travel crowds from summer holidays.
Some outdoor venues may begin reducing hours as they prepare for autumn schedule changes.

activities: Autumn photography in the historic center
Scenic walks along autumn riverside paths
